abstract: Procter & Gamble was ordered Tuesday to stop advertising that its Vicks foaming sanitizer for hands prevents the spread of viruses that cause colds.
snippet: Procter & Gamble was ordered Tuesday to stop advertising that its Vicks foaming sanitizer for hands prevents the spread of viruses that cause colds.
lead_paragraph: Procter & Gamble was ordered yesterday to stop advertising that its Vicks foaming sanitizer for hands prevents the spread of viruses that cause colds.

headline.main: F.D.A. Warns Procter on Hand Sanitizer Advertising
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Warns Procter on Hand Sanitizer Advertising
